main.name: Hapi Haus Cleaning Services Ltd.
main.description: Professional cleaning services with a smile
main.aboutText: Hapi Haus Cleaning Services Ltd. is a proud family company with strong business ethics and principles. We believe in being honest and transparent with our clients and in building long-standing relationships on trust and integrity. We stand behind our high standards and quality services. We are committed to utilizing our resources and expertise to meet the ever-changing demands and objectives of your business.
main.servicesText: Hapi Haus Cleaning Services is a facility services company that empowers its customers through an approach that lowers facility service costs, increases efficiency and energizes performance. To achieve quality results, we formulate a cleaning service plan tailored to your office, warehouse, car dealership, retail stores. This approach allows us to maintain high standards based on specific performance metrics. As a result, it becomes easier to meet your cleaning needs. As skilled and trained cleaning professionals, we realize that a corporate image and a clean, healthy working environment is a must. We offer all the standard janitorial necessities such as:
